title: Creative Paper Quilling: Wall Art, Jewelry, Cards & More!
description: Expert technique information, helpful tips, and eye-catching designs are the hallmarks of this guide to paper quilling. Beginners as well as experienced artists will find projects to suit every fancy as they enjoy creating the unique wall art, handmade greeting cards, stylish pendants and earrings, and festive holiday ornaments from several top designers featured in this book. Readers require no exclusive or expensive tools or products in order to experience the creative adventure offered by this manual.
author: Ann   Martin
